templates.template: - $IF($EQUALS(@@[Type]@@,#View),#@@iconViewFormat@@{.viewIcon title="View Format"},#$IF($EQUALS(@@[Type]@@,#Column),#@@iconColumnFormat@@{.columnIcon title="Column Format"},#@@iconFormFormat@@{.formIcon title="Form Format"})) [@@[Title]@@](@@[Link]@@){target=_blank title="@@[Name]@@: $REPLACE(@@[Description]@@,#`,#)"}

file.section:
# List of Column Formatting Samples
This is an alphabetical list of all the **column formatting** samples available. Each sample has a dedicated readme file to explain setup instructions and demonstrated capability.
!!! Tip Depending on what you are looking for, you may find the sample [groupings](./groupings/columntype.md) more helpful.

# List of Form Formatting Samples
This is an alphabetical list of all the **form formatting** samples available. Each sample has a dedicated readme file to explain setup instructions and demonstrated capability.
!!! Tip Depending on what you are looking for, you may find the sample [groupings](./groupings/operator.md) more helpful.

# List of View Formatting Samples
This is an alphabetical list of all the **view formatting** samples available. Each sample has a dedicated readme file to explain setup instructions and demonstrated capability.
!!! Tip Depending on what you are looking for, you may find the sample [groupings](./groupings/category.md) more helpful.

#Samples by Action
Samples are grouped by their usage of `customRowAction` `action` properties. Expand to see the related samples.

#Samples by Author
Samples are grouped by their _original_ creator. Later updates by additional contributors are not listed here. Expand to see the related samples.

# Samples by Category
Samples are grouped by topic or approach. This is not an exhaustive list.

# Samples by Column Type
Samples are grouped by the column type they are applied to (column formats) or, in the case of view/form formats, by any columns they reference. Expand to see the related samples.

# Samples by Feature
Samples are grouped by their usage of key features. Expand to see the related samples.

# Samples by Operator
Samples are grouped by their usage of advanced operators. This excludes common arithmetic operators (`+`, `-`, `/`, `*`) and conditional operators (`if`, `<`, `<=`, `>`, `>=`, `==`, `!=`, `||`, `&&`). Expand to see the related samples.

# SharePoint 2019 Format Samples
The following samples provide a version that works within SharePoint 2019.

!!! Note View and Form formatting are **not** supported in SharePoint 2019 and so the above are all column format samples.
Each of the above samples contain at least 2 json files. The SharePoint 2019 files end in AST.

# Samples by Placeholder Token
Samples are grouped by their usage of placeholder tokens. `@currentField` is excluded because it is used nearly everywhere. Expand to see the related samples.

# Samples by Class: ms-bgColor-*
The `ms-bgColor-*` classes apply a **background color**. Several standard, shared, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

!!! Note "Complimentary Classes" These classes compliment the [ms-borderColor-*](./ms-borderClass.md) and [ms-fontColor-*](./ms-fontColor.md) classes and except where noted below contain equivalent colors.
!!! Warning The named color `alert` does not have a `ms-bgColor-` equivalent despite being present elsewhere

# Samples by Class: ms-borderColor-*
The `ms-borderColor-*` classes apply a **border color** (still requires a `border-width` and `border-style` to display). Several standard, shared, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

!!! Note "Complimentary Classes" These classes compliment the [ms-fontColor-*](./ms-fontColor.md) and [ms-bgColor-*](./ms-bgColor.md) classes and except where noted below contain equivalent colors.
!!! Warning The named colors `alert`, `severeWarning`, `warning`, and `error` do not have `ms-borderColor-` equivalents despite being present elsewhere

# Samples by Class: ms-fontColor-*
The `ms-fontColor-*` classes apply a font **color**. Several standard, shared, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

!!! Note "Complimentary Classes" These classes compliment the [ms-borderClass-*](./ms-borderClass.md) and [ms-bgColor-*](./ms-bgColor.md) classes and except where noted below contain equivalent colors.

# Samples by Class: ms-fontWeight-*
The `ms-fontWeight-*` classes apply various levels of **bold**.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

# Samples by Class: ms-font-*
The `ms-font-*` classes apply various combinations of text **size** and **font weight**. To apply just size or just weight use the [ms-fontSize-*](./ms-fontSize.md) and [ms-fontWeight-*](./ms-fontWeight.md) classes respectively.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

# Samples by Class: ms-fontSize-*
The `ms-fontSize-*` classes apply various text **size**.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.
